lore: If the Revenants from every ocean joined to conquer the surface, it is very likely that they would succeed due to their numbers. Luckily, they are an extremely divided people who have but a few kingdoms.\n\nThe Revenant Horror pushes its weapon against their enemies' necks, then drives it into the wall to prevent their movements. Once its enemies are subdued, it locks eyes with them to provoke irrational and terrifying thoughts that convince them that they are about to transform into a Revenant.
menagerieDialog: It's a common misconception that all Revenants like to fight. I, for one, would prefer to lead a quiet life and dedicate myself to collecting minerals.
What's wrong? You look like a fish out of water.\n\nHA!
(Revenants hate when you call them "fish people". Never make that mistake.)
I am not a fish. I am NOT. A FISH.\n\n(This is the most sensitive fish you've ever met.)
(It smells like dead fish. Probably because that's exactly what it is.)
name: Revenant Horror
